document_title: Gnathostomiasis: Causes, symptoms, treatment and prevention
subsection_content: Currently, treatment of gnathostomiasis is quite convenient. Effective treatment drugs are albendazole and ivermectin. In addition, depending on the sequelae of gnathostomiasis, doctors have different treatment options for each patient. Therefore, if suspected of being infected with gnathostome parasites, the patient needs to see a doctor for the most appropriate treatment.
